about_1: I am a DevOps engineer currently based in Belgrade. I have been working with clouds for the last 7 years, mainly AWS. I also have experience working with AliCloud / Yandex Cloud / Selectel Cloud Platform. My experience includes building infrastructure using Terraform, preparing CI/CD and automating complex processes by writing scripts and utilities ({tools}).
about_2: Outside of working and helping my wife take care of our three American Cocker Spaniels, I enjoy video games (Stronghold Crusader & Call of Duty are my favorite), Japanese and Chinese food, American football (for a long time I played in St. Petersburg and played for the Russian national team).
download-body: For PDF download, choose 'Save as PDF' in the print dialog instead of a physical printer.
opsgin: Utility for integrating on-duty Opsgenie and Slack
sshpass: A fork of wonderful utility with added support of prompt for TOTP and Ansible
uivmm: A convenient control panel for working with LXC containers via message transmission to GRPC providers
